title: Chelsea boss Antonio Conte SLAMMED as ‘disrespectful’ by former star
content: The Nigerian joined the Blues as a teenager and enjoyed 11 successful years at Stamford Bridge, winning two Premier League titles, three FA Cups, a Champions League and a Europa League.  But Mikel moved to Chinese Super League club Tianjin TEDA last January after not featuring once in Antonio Conte’s first four months in charge.  The Italian led the Blues to the title that season but failed to continue that momentum into his second campaign and is expected to leave this summer.  And Mikel has opened up on why he left the club, criticising Conte for not appreciating the players that had...
